code: import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{setRegistrationModalVisible,setLoginModalVisible,logoutUser,loginAnonymous}from'../store/actions.js';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var NavBar=function NavBar(){var isAuthenticated=useSelector(function(state){return state.isAuthenticated;});var dispatch=useDispatch();var showRegistrationModal=function showRegistrationModal(){dispatch(setRegistrationModalVisible(true));};var showLoginModal=function showLoginModal(){dispatch(setLoginModalVisible(true));};var handleLogoutUser=function handleLogoutUser(){dispatch(logoutUser());};var handleLoginAnonymous=function handleLoginAnonymous(){dispatch(loginAnonymous());};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"navbar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"navbar-menu",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"registration-button",onClick:showRegistrationModal,children:"Register"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:!isAuthenticated?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"login-button",onClick:showLoginModal,children:"Login"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"logout-button",onClick:handleLogoutUser,children:"Logout"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"demo-button",onClick:handleLoginAnonymous,children:"Demo"})})]})});};export default NavBar;
